name: lending-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Pegasys Lending

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:hosted:rollux-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=syscoin npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=pollum-io/pegasys-lending npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
